General.Name: Shenzhen Minkave Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Minkave Technology Co., Ltd. engages in undertaking lighting engineering projects in China. It undertakes projects in the areas of urban night planning, cultural tourism scenic spot, smart street light systems, and light shows. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Minkave City Lighting Technology Co., Ltd. Shenzhen Minkave Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Block A, Building 10, Floor 17-20, Shenzhen, China, 518054
